description: Nilsson Special Vehicles engages in the development, manufacture, and trade of specialty cars. The company is headquartered in Laholm, Hallands and currently employs 51 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2015-12-11. The firm manufactures specially adapted vehicles in the main industries, pre-hospital care, funeral, and limousine service. The firm produces and sells limousines, ambulances and hearses. The firm additionally provides financing through external partners; facilitates service agreements with Original equipment manufacturer (OEM) workshops; provides support for workshops with technical service and spare-parts, and conducts trading in used vehicles. The Company’s production facilities are located in Laholm. The Company’s products are sold through agents and distributors in the European markets. The firm has a production area of approximately 8,500 square meters.
name: Nilsson Special Vehicles AB (publ)
